    • registerFidelityCard

      public void registerFidelityCard(FidelityCard fidelityCard)
      Registers the customer to the specified fidelity card. If the same fidelity plan is specified again, the customer keeps his old card with its advantages.
      Parameters:
      fidelityCard - : a fidelity card.

    • registerFidelityCard

      public void registerFidelityCard(String fidelityCardType)

    • unregisterFidelityCard

      public void unregisterFidelityCard()
      Unregisters the customer from old fidelity plan. The new plan is the default one given upon registration.
